summary: A mad scientist turns a man into an electrically-controlled monster to do his bidding.
cast: Lionel Atwill|Lon Chaney Jr.|Anne Nagel|Frank Albertson|Samuel S. Hinds|William B. Davidson|Ben Taggart|Constance Bergen|Ivan Miller|Chester Gan|George Meader|Frank O'Connor|John Dilson|Byron Foulger|Jessie Arnold|James Blaine|Gary Breckner|Corky|Lowell Drew|John Ellis|Douglas Evans|Jack Gardner|William Hall|Russell Hicks|Wright Kramer|Tom Quinn|Bob Reeves|Mel Ruick|Francis Sayles|Paul Scott|David Sharpe|Victor Zimmerman
title: El hombre que fabricaba monstruos
